description: Beaver Builder is a city-building game where you play as a beaver who must build a dam to save his village from rising water. The game features over 100 buildings, 11 maps, and a built-in map editor. You can also play in endless survival mode or choose from a variety of difficulty levels.
name: Beaver Builder
